mapper.sql: id, qie, cost_name, supplier_code, calculate_way, count, unit, source, unit_price, cid, amount, remarks
mapper.select: select t.id,t.qie,t.cost_code,t.cost_name,t.supplier_id,t.calculate_way,t.count,t.unit,t.source,t.unit_price,t.cid,t.amount,t.remarks,t.minimum_quantity, t1.supplier_code supplierCode, t1.company_name supplierName from template_cope_with t left join supplier_info t1 on t1.id = t.supplier_id where 1=1 and t.qie = #{qie}

select t.id, t.qie, t.cost_code, t.cost_name, t.supplier_id, t.calculate_way, t.count, t.unit, t.source, t.unit_price, t.cid, t.amount, t.remarks, t.minimum_quantity, t1.supplier_code supplierCode, t1.company_name supplierName, t2.currency_code, t2.currency_name from template_cope_with t left join supplier_info t1 on t1.id = t.supplier_id left join currency_info t2 on t2.id = t.cid where t.qie = #{qie}
